teams.title: Teams
teams.desc1: Creating teams allows you to share bot accounts and other features with team members
teams.desc2: Note: You may only be a member of 5 teams total!
teams.none: You do not own or belong to any teams.

name.title: Team Name
name.help: Give your team a name. This name will be shown publically.

icon.title: Team Icon
icon.help: Give your team an icon; this can be any image type.

invites.title: Invites
invites.none: You have not been invited to any new teams
invites.desc1: {user} has invited to join the team!
invites.joined: You have successfully joined the {team} team!
invites.rejected: You have rejected the invite to join {team}.

manage.title: Manage: {team}
manage.desc1: Here you can edit your team information. Along with adding or removing members.
manage.desc2: You'll also be able to update any shared data which all tied user(s) BeepBot channels will have access to.
manage.invited: {user} has been invited. They have 48 hours to accept the invite.
manage.removed: {user} has been removed from the team.

teams.noBio: This team lacks a Bio. So have a bad joke instead. What did the fish say when he swam into a wall? Dam.
